short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts article content from any webpage and sends it to AIMasher.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AiMasher Chrome Extension – Simplify Content Curation in One Click

Transform how you engage with online content using the AiMasher Chrome Extension. In just one click, you can scrape any article from the web and send it directly to AiMasher, your AI-powered content assistant.

Ver 1.2.2
Templates can be selected on the main popup of the extension.

Ver 1.2.3
The article images have also been transferred to AIMasher.

With AiMasher, you can:

Rewrite the article to create completely unique content
Summarize long articles into concise, easy-to-digest insights
Generate a voice-over, bringing your content to life with natural-sounding audio
Whether you’re a content creator, marketer, or simply looking to repurpose web content, the AiMasher Chrome Extension streamlines the process, giving you fresh, original material effortlessly.

Key Features:

Seamless integration with your AiMasher account
Instantly rewrite, summarize, and voice over content
Boost your productivity and creativity with minimal effort
Unlock the full potential of AI-powered content creation with AiMasher. Download the extension today and experience content like never before!
